explains: v. 奔忙，匆忙地走；繁忙，热闹；使（人沿着某个方向）匆忙地走
n. 喧闹，繁忙；（旧时用以撑起裙子后部的）裙撑
wordGroup: hustle and bustle 熙熙攘攘，忙碌
bustle about 忙碌；东奔西跑

sentences.en: We escaped from the hustle and bustle of the city for the weekend.
sentences.cn: 我们周末时躲开了城市的拥挤喧嚣。

sentences.en: The calm of the countryside came as a welcome relief from the hustle and bustle of city life.
sentences.cn: 离开喧嚣忙碌的城市生活，来到宁静的乡村，是一种令人愉快的调剂。

sentences.en: The hotel offers a haven of peace and serenity away from the bustle of the city.
sentences.cn: 那家旅馆远离闹市，是一个幽静安谧的好去处。
